search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Planning Center (planning-center.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL for the Planning Center pricing page is: [https://www.planningcenter.com/pricing](https://www.planningcenter.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Planning Center Pricing: Only Pay for What Your Church Needs

extracted_content.content:
![Image 1: pricing calculator](https://www.planningcenter.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fpricing%2Fpricing-calculator%403x.png&w=384&q=75)

You can sign up for the full system or subscribe á la carte style—create a custom plan by exploring the different options for each product.

*   30 Days Free
*   Cancel Anytime
*   Full Support Access

Selected Products

[](https://www.planningcenter.com/people)

Included free with every plan

People is a completely free membership database including profile management, custom reporting, online forms, workflows, and communication tools.

[](https://www.planningcenter.com/calendar)$0

1Rooms (Unlimited Events)

With Calendar, you can manage unlimited events for free. If you are also using it to track rooms and resources, plans are priced by the number of rooms you are managing.

Check-Ins is priced by the number of check-ins on your busiest day of the week. All plans include full feature access and an unlimited number of check-in stations and administrators.

[](https://www.planningcenter.com/giving)$0

10Monthly Donations

Giving is priced by the total number of donations you collect and track each month. All plans include full feature access. Card, ACH transfer, and Apple Pay transactions are processed for a low, additional fee by Stripe. [Learn more.](https://www.planningcenter.com/pricing#processing-fees)

[](https://www.planningcenter.com/groups)$0

15Group Members

Groups is priced by the number of members (including leaders) in an active group. Members are only counted once, even if they belong to many groups. Visitors are never included in the total. All plans included unlimited groups and group events.

[](https://www.planningcenter.com/publishing)$0

Home Page & Navigation

Publishing is priced by which features you want to access. All plans include a home page and navigation options for Church Center. Upgrade to a paid plan to create custom pages and share sermon video and audio.

[](https://www.planningcenter.com/registrations)$0

5Event Attendees

Registrations is priced by the number of attendees for your largest event. All plans include full feature access and an unlimited number of events. Card and Apple pay transactions are processed for a low, additional fee by Stripe. [Learn more.](https://www.planningcenter.com/pricing#processing-fees)

[](https://www.planningcenter.com/services)$0

5Team Members(100MB Storage)

Add Music Stand($5)

Services is priced by the number of people who access the system in any way. All plans include full feature access and an unlimited number of teams, service types, and plans.

Pricing Details
---------------

*   All plans start with a 30-day free trial. We won’t even ask for payment information until after the 30 days.
    
*   We won’t lock you into a contract, you can adjust your plan any time, and you won’t be fined if you cancel.
    
*   People is completely free. You can always use it on its own, but it’s more powerful alongside our other apps.
    
*   Card payment is preferred, but check is an option. You can pay monthly (card only) or every 3, 6, or 12 months.
    
*   Giving, Check-Ins, and Registrations plans have soft limits, so you can occasionally exceed them.
    
*   All transactions accepted in Giving and Registrations are processed for a low fee by Stripe.
    

Low Processing Fees
-------------------

Online payments in Giving and Registrations are processed at the lowest available rate by [Stripe](https://stripe.com/)—an easy-to-use payment processor with no  setup fees, monthly minimums, or cancellation fees. They have the highest level of PCI compliance and are trusted by some of the world's [largest businesses and non-profits](https://stripe.com/customers).

Stripe’s fee is the only processing fee associated with Giving and Registrations. We do not charge any additional fees or beyond your monthly subscription. Use our processing fee calculator to see how much your church can save.

[Calculate Your Savings](https://www.planningcenter.com/processing-fee#calculate-fees)

Planning Center Discounted Rate

*   2.15% + $0.30/donation for credit and debit card donations 0% + $0.30 per ACH bank transfer donation

Have a question about pricing?
------------------------------

Our support team is ready to answer any questions you have about our pricing or our products.

[Contact support](https://support.planningcenteronline.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

You can sign up for individual Planning Center products or bundle them together.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is modular and based on the usage of individual products. Some products are free, and others have usage-based pricing.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Free membership database with profile management and other tools.
Manage unlimited events for free. Pricing applies for room tracking.
Priced by the number of check-ins on the busiest day.
Priced by the number of donations tracked monthly.
Priced by the number of active group members.
Priced by the number of attendees for the largest event.
Priced by the number of people accessing the system.

additional_fees.fee_description: 2.15% + $0.30 per credit/debit card donation, $0.30 per ACH bank transfer donation.
